Description:
Design, develop, and maintain high-quality web applications using ASP.NET MVC, ASP.NET Core, and other .NET frameworks.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to gather and analyze requirements, and contribute to technical discussions.
Write clean, efficient, and maintainable code while adhering to best practices and coding standards.
Implement and maintain database schemas, tables, and stored procedures using SQL Server and Entity Framework.
Create and consume Web APIs and web services to facilitate data exchange between different applications.
Develop responsive and user-friendly front-end interfaces using HTML5, CSS, Bootstrap, and JavaScript libraries, JQuery.
Work with XML, JSON, and other data formats to ensure seamless data integration.
Collaborate with UX/UI designers to ensure the best user experience and visual design implementation.
Troubleshoot and debug issues across different layers of the application stack.
Stay updated with the latest .NET technologies, trends, and best practices to continuously enhance development processes.Skills
Skills:
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field.
Proven experience as a .NET Developer with 2 to 5 years of hands-on experience.
Strong proficiency in ASP.NET MVC, ASP.NET Core, C#, and Entity Framework.
Experience with designing and consuming RESTful Web APIs and web services.
Proficiency in SQL Server, including database design, LINQ, and query optimization.
Solid understanding of front-end technologies: HTML5, CSS, Bootstrap, JavaScript, and jQuery.
Familiarity with XML and JSON data formats for data exchange.
Knowledge of version control systems (Git) and Agile development methodologies.
Strong problem-solving skills and a proactive approach to finding solutions.
Excellent communication skills and ability to work effectively within a team.
Ability to work independently, manage priorities, and meet project deadlines.
